de.sogomn.engine.net

Class TCPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sogomn.engine.net.TCPConnection

  • public class TCPConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    TCPConnection is for writing and reading simple data (well - text).
    Author:
    Sogomn
